item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I'm Ben, the craftsman behind Chonky Woodworks. With a passion for woodworking and a keen eye for detail, I create custom, handcrafted cutting boards, cheese boards, wooden side tables, and epoxy tables, all made with premium materials like walnut, maple, and other exotic woods. Each piece is uniquely designed to bring both beauty and functionality into your home, ensuring that every item is as unique and special as the moments it helps create.
